title: Drawing, "The Assumption of the Virgin", 1813–18
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 81, Gian Bologna in Bologna; on verso, inscribed in color: comune di Ravenna
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: On verso: study of ceiling; four architectural decorative studies

Drawing, "The Assumption of the Virgin", 1813–18.
1813–18. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3541.
